displayTitleBar.title: Display Title Bar
displayTitleBar.description: Determines whether or not the title bar should be displayed by default.

displayMenuBar.title: Display Menu Bar
displayMenuBar.description: Determines whether or not the menu bar should be displayed by default. Overridden by 'Auto Hide'.

openAdjacent.title: Open Adjacent Categories On Hover
openAdjacent.description: Opens adjacent menu categories on mouse hover as long as a menu category is already open.

autoHide.title: Auto Hide Menu Bar
autoHide.description: Automatically hide the menu bar and toggle it by pressing Alt. Overrides 'Display Menu Bar'.

altGivesFocus.title: Alt Gives Focus
altGivesFocus.description: Releasing the alt key gives focus to the application menu.

menuBarMnemonics.title: Menu Bar Mnemonics
menuBarMnemonics.description: Controls whether the application menu can be navigated with alt-key shortcuts.

autoSelectColor.title: Automatically Select Title Bar Colors
autoSelectColor.description: The ui-variables will be used as a base for the title bar design.

baseColor.title: Base Color
baseColor.description: Color of the title bar background

highlightColor.title: Highlight Color
highlightColor.description: Color of the highlighted fields in the menu bar

textColor.title: Text Color
textColor.description: Base for text and icons in the title bar
